title: Stratos Air Charter
description: Stratos Air Charter is a fictional private-aviation firm that aims to make booking a charter aircraft as effortless as buying a Movie online. We went for a clean white-and-blue design, subtle scroll-animations and micro-interactions to reinforce their modern and luxurious yet functionality focused brand. Our build is focusing on building trust and funneling prospects straight to the charter-estimate form â€” no unnecessary frills: Simple, Sleek and Stunning.

title: Project Aerospace Directory
description: A web application for browsing and filtering aviation businesses, powered by a backend database.

title: Project Jetstream Analytics
description: A data dashboard for a charter airline company to track bookings, revenue, and performance KPIs.
